dcterms:creator: J. F. Hu
W. S. Zheng
J. Lai
J. Zhang
dcterms:description: The NTU RGB+D dataset was specifically collected for the research of large-scale RGB-D human action recognition. It contains more than 56K action samples for both training and testing, with a challenging and large number of action classes, views, and samples with large intra-class variations.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. F. Hu
W. S. Zheng
L. Ma
G. Wang
J. Lai
dcterms:description: The SYSU 3D HOI dataset was collected for studying complex actions with human-object interactions. It contains 480 samples from 6 pairs of interaction actions, which is challenging due to similar object contexts and interactive motions.
dcterms:title: SYSU 3D HOI Dataset
